name: Pontus Ekberg
content: Pontus Ekberg Pontus Ekberg Associate professor, Docent Department of Information Technology Uppsala University About   Publications   Teaching About I am an associate professor at the Department of Information Technology at Uppsala University. My research interests are in the design and analysis of algorithms and in computational complexity, especially when related to real-time scheduling theory. I am Director of Studies for the Division of Computer Systems. Contact Office: Room 105194, Ångströmlaboratoriet E-mail: pontus.ekberg [-at-] it.uu.se (PGP key) Phone: +4618-471 7341 Postal address: Uppsala University Department of Information Technology Att: Pontus Ekberg Box 337 SE-751 05 Uppsala Sweden
